description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,289); woman at left in a yellow gown with blue and pink striped overgown and a hat with pink ribbon and white plumes; woman in the center in a pink and green gown; woman at right in a white dotted gown, a pink and purple overgown, and a pink and purple hat with a green bow and dark gray plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Quatorzième Cahier, 30 Mars 1788
